Title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie
Genre: Animation, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Mystery
Writer: Brian Hohlfeld (screenplay), Evan Spiliotopoulos (screenplay), A.A. Milne (characters)
Actors: Jim Cummings, John Fiedler, Nikita Hopkins, Kath Soucie
Plot: A Heffalump is heard trumpeting in the hundred acre woods. Winnie the Pooh, Tigger, and Piglet are scared and rush to Rabbit's house for advice. Roo joins them and they all agree that ...
